org.trianacode.taskgraph.tool

Interface ToolTable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ToolTableImpl

    public interface ToolTable
    An interface to the currently loaded tools.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String USER_TOOLBOX

    • Method Detail

      • getToolBoxes

        Toolbox[] getToolBoxes()
        Returns:
        a list of the current tool box paths

      • getToolBoxPaths

        java.lang.String[] getToolBoxPaths()

      • getProperties

        TrianaProperties getProperties()

      • getToolBoxes

        Toolbox[] getToolBoxes(java.lang.String type)
        Returns:
        the tool box path of the specified type (null if no tool box specified for that type)

      • getToolBoxType

        java.lang.String getToolBoxType(java.lang.String toolbox)
        Returns:
        the type for the specified tool box path (null if no type specified for the tool box path)

      • getTools

        Tool[] getTools(java.net.URL definitionPath)
        get the list of tools that share the same definition path. This could be the case if a tool is in a jar file for example, which contains other tools.
        Parameters:
        definitionPath -
        Returns:

      • addToolBox

        void addToolBox(Toolbox... path)
        Add a tool box path to the current tool boxes

      • removeToolBox

        boolean removeToolBox(java.lang.String path)
        Remove a tool box path from the current tool boxes

      • getTool

        Tool getTool(java.lang.String toolName)
        Returns:
        the tool with the specified name (if there are multiple tools with the same name then the first found is returned)

      • getTools

        Tool[] getTools()
        get all tools
        Returns:

      • isTool

        boolean isTool(java.lang.String toolName)
        Returns:
        true if a tool with the given name exists

      • getToolNames

        java.lang.String[] getToolNames()
        Returns:
        an array of the names of the currently loaded tools

      • insertTool

        void insertTool(Tool tool,
              java.lang.String pack,
              java.lang.String toolbox)
        Inserts a copy of the tool into the specified package. Combined with deleteTool this can be used to cut + paste tools.
        Parameters:
        tool - the tool being pasted
        pack - the package of the pasted tool
        toolbox - the toolbox the tool is pasted into (ignore if irrelevant)

      • deleteTool

        void deleteTool(Tool tool,
              boolean files)
        Deletes the specified tool.

      • isModifiable

        boolean isModifiable(Tool tool)
        return true if this tool can be modified. A remote tool, or a jarred tool may not be.
        Parameters:
        tool -
        Returns:

      • refreshLocation

        void refreshLocation(java.net.URL location,
                   java.lang.String toolbox)
        Notifies the tool table to update the tool loaded from the specified location, such as when a tool is created. The location should be in a form understanded by the tool table (e.g. XML file location, tool server network address), and is ignored if not understood.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the file
        toolbox - the toolbox the location is in (specify null if unknown)

      • addToolTableListener

        void addToolTableListener(ToolListener listener)
        Adds a listener to be notified when new tools are added/removed

      • removeToolTableListener

        void removeToolTableListener(ToolListener listener)
        Removes a listener from being notified when new tools are added/removed

      • getPasteFileLocation

        java.lang.String getPasteFileLocation(java.lang.String toolname,
                                    java.lang.String pack,
                                    java.lang.String toolbox)
        Generate a new file location to store a pasted tool
        Parameters:
        toolname - tool to be created
        pack - tool package name
        toolbox - toolbox to create the tool in
        Returns:
        a unused file to store the xml for the specified tool in

      • getToolResolver

        ToolResolver getToolResolver()
        Gets the tool resolver for this tool table -- added by Ian T to fix the static loading of tool resolvers.
